Author: ComputerGenie ğŸ‘´ğŸ¼ğŸ“¢#7004
Content:
fee or no fee can be changed with a couple basic node settings
the only chains that would be an "issue" sending no fee on is one you cannot mine and/or no pool allows below x amount

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
`-ac_reward=1 -ac_end=1` is a no block reward chain
why anyone would mine it is a different issue
